name: THAT NIGHT, STEEPED BY BLOOD RIVER
name_original: THAT NIGHT, STEEPED BY BLOOD RIVER
description:
please doctor please

waiting for your call

wicked won't be alone

flowered road-side

left penny-eyed

comes down hard

worry on your head so you can't eat

pill drown drench

remedy, bloody sea

ripping out old wallpaper, flowered

we all sign the book

shredded destroyed

another hospital trip

you visiting a flowered room

your hero past lying

with remain, lingerance

when you go down to the river

to dust remember, receive

& travel on it or

live cursed forever
